sen.j: 父から佐治村を譲られるも幼少であったため。
sen.e: Although he was given the Saji village by his father, he was very young at that time.

sen.j: そのため、兄の曳田康貞がその所職を代行した。
sen.e: Therefore, his older brother Yasusada HIKETA served the position for him.
Therefore, his older brother Yasusada HIKETA served the position for him.

sen.j: その後、元服し鎌倉幕府御家人となった重貞は郷司職の返還を兄に対して求めた。
sen.e: Later, he reached the manhood, became a gokenin (shogunal retainers) of the Kamakura bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun), and asked his older brother to return the position of Goshi shiki (subdistrict headships).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Afterward, Shigesada, who had become a gokenin (shogunal retainers) of the Kamakura bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) after reaching the manhood, asked his older brother to return the position of Goshi shiki.
sen.cmt: 文の流れがわかりづらいため変更を加えました。
sen.e: Afterward, Shigesada, who had become a gokenin (shogunal retainers) of the Kamakura bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) after reaching the manhood, asked his older brother to return the position of Goshi shiki.

sen.j: しかし、いっこうに返還されないばかりか、兄の康貞は実子に所職を譲度してしまったた。
sen.e: However, his brother Yasusada did not return the position; further, Yasusada even gave the position to his own son.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, so far from returning the position to Shigesada, his brother Yasusada transferred it to his son.
sen.cmt: わかりづらいため変更を加えました。
sen.e: However, so far from returning the position to Shigesada, his brother Yasusada transferred it to his son.

sen.j: そのため、訴訟を起こして争っていた。
sen.e: Therefore, Shigesada sued his older brother.

sen.j: 建暦3年（1213年）5月、当時40歳であった重貞は、和田合戦において北条義時方について功を為し、ようやく同年11月に佐治郷司並びに地頭に補任された。
sen.e: In May 1213, Shigesada sided Yoshitoki HOJO and fought well in the Battle of WADA when he was at the age of 40, and he finally gained the position of Goji and Jito of the Saji-go.

In May 1213, Shigesada performed great feats in the Battle of WADA at the age of 40 by taking sides with Yoshitoki HOJO, with the result that he was finally appointed to the position of Goji and Jito of Saji-go in November of the same year.
sen.cmt: 訳もれ。「同年11月」が訳もれしていました。文の流れがわかりづらいため変更を加えました。佐治郷の前の冠詞を省きました。
sen.e: In May 1213, Shigesada performed great feats in the Battle of WADA at the age of 40 by taking sides with Yoshitoki HOJO, with the result that he was finally appointed to the position of Goji and Jito of Saji-go in November of the same year.

sen.j: この後、重貞の子孫は百数十年間に渡って佐治郷の支配を行った。
sen.e: Since then, the descendants of Shigesada ruled the Saji-go over several hundred years.
Since then, the descendants of Shigesada ruled Saji-go for more than a century.
sen.cmt: 百数十年間の表現を変更しました。また佐治郷の前の冠詞を省きました。
sen.e: Since then, the descendants of Shigesada ruled Saji-go for more than a century.
